summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Northlake Avenue from Fourteenth Avenue Northeast to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast form Northlake Avenue to Brintnall Place, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with the necessary wyes, openings, manholes, lampholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 523 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
